Question: How many points does this kingdom score? Note: we are using the middle kingdom variant.
Rationale: (7 fields X 2 crowns) + (1 wasteland X 2 crowns) + (1 wasteland X 1 crown) + (2 meadows X 3 crowns) + (2 mines X 4 crowns) + no bonus points for middle kingdom variant as the castle is not placed in the middle
